direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the collection by removing elements, but retainAll retains only the specified elements.
Both methods remove elements from the collection, but removeIf uses a predicate to determine which elements to remove.
Both methods remove elements from the collection, but clear removes all elements, while removeAll removes only those specified.
Both methods remove elements from the collection, but remove removes a single specified element, while removeAll removes all specified elements.
Both methods involve modifying the collection by adding or removing elements, but addAll adds elements instead of removing them.
Both methods involve modifying the collection, but add adds a single element, while removeAll removes multiple elements.
Both methods involve modifying the composite collection, but removeComposited removes a collection from the composite, while removeAll removes elements from the collections within the composite.
